name: Courteney Cox

structured_info.background: Courteney Cox is an American actress and producer, widely recognized for her roles as Monica Geller in *Friends* (1994–2004) and Gale Weathers in the *Scream* franchise (1996–present). She has received a Screen Actors Guild Award and has been nominated for two Emmy Awards. Her career includes appearances in numerous films and television shows, including *Family Ties*, *Masters of the Universe*, and *Desperate Housewives*.

summary: Courteney Cox is a highly accomplished American actress and producer best known for her iconic roles in *Friends* and *Scream*. She has received industry recognition including a Screen Actors Guild Award and Emmy nominations.

name: David Arquette

structured_info.background: David Arquette is best known for his role as Dewey Riley in the *Scream* film franchise. He has also appeared in films like *Never Been Kissed* and on *Saturday Night Live*. He was previously married to Courteney Cox.

summary: David Arquette is a multi-faceted entertainer working as an actor, comedian, director, and producer, widely recognized for his iconic role in the *Scream* movies.

name: Richard Cox

structured_info.background: Richard Cox was the father of actress Courteney Cox. He passed away in 1994 and had sisters Virginia and Dorothy, as well as nephews Hunter Copeland and Ian Copeland.

summary: Richard Cox was a businessman and is primarily known as the father of actress Courteney Cox. He died in 1994 and was survived by his sisters and nephews.

name: Hunter Copeland

structured_info.background: Hunter Copeland is the uncle of actress Courteney Cox.

summary: Hunter Copeland is a businessman known for being the uncle of actress Courteney Cox.

name: Ian Copeland

structured_info.background: Ian Copeland is the uncle of actress Courteney Cox.

summary: Ian Copeland is a Business Manager and is known as the uncle of Courteney Cox.
